src:
Saingan 6 penjuru PRK Tanjung Piai [METROTV]
02 Nov 2019, 11:17 by Mohd Sabran Md Sani



PILIHAN Raya Kecil (PRK) Tanjung Piai pada 16 Disember ini menyaksikan pertembungan enam penjuru.
Pengumuman rasmi calon bertanding dibuat Pengurus Pilihan Raya Tanjung Piai, Zulkifly Mohd Tahir pada 11 pagi selepas tempoh penamaan calon di pusat penamaan Dewan Jubli Intan di Pontian, ditutup 10 pagi tadi.
Enam calon terbabit ialah calon Pakatan Harapan (PH) dari Bersatu, Karmaine Sardini, 66; calon Barisan Nasional (BN), Datuk Seri Dr Wee Jeck Seng dan Parti Gerakan Rakyat Rakyat Malaysia (Gerakan), Wendy Subramaniam.
Turut bertanding, Presiden Berjasa, Dr Badrulhisham Abdul Aziz dan dua calon bebas, Dr Ang Chuan Lock yang juga pengetua sebuah pusat tuisyen serta Faridah Aryani Abdul Ghaffar.
Mereka mengemukakan borang pencalonan masing-masing sebelum tempoh sejam penamaan calon tamat pada jam 10 pagi ini.
Terdahulu Zulkifly, membuat pengumuman rasmi bagi cabutan susunan calon PRK Tanjung Piai untuk dicatatkan pada kertas undi.
“Saya panggil calon-calon berdasarkan waktu ketibaan dan kita akan mulakan proses ini sekarang (cabutan susunan),” katanya membuat pengumuman jam 10.27 pagi.
Turutan nombor kertas undi didahului Wendy, Jeck Seng, Dr Ang.
Selain itu nama keempat Karmaine; Dr Badrulhisham dan Faridah Aryani.


Lagi berita berkaitan PRK Tanjung Piai


i.


Dari kiri, Dr Ang, Karmaine, Dr Badhrulhisham, Jeck Seng, Wendy Subramaniam dan Faridah. FOTO Hairul Anuar Rahim


Berita Berkaitan
text:
Competition 6 corner of Tanjung Piai PRK [METROTV]
02 Nov 2019, 11:17 by Mohd Sabran Md Sani



The Tanjung Piai By-Election (GE) on December 16 saw a six-way clash.
The official announcement of the contested candidate was made by Tanjung Piai Election Manager Zulkifly Mohd Tahir at 11am after the nomination period at the Diamond Jubilee Hall in Pontian, closed 10am today.
The six candidates are Pakatan Harapan (PH) from the United States, Karmaine Sardini, 66; Barisan Nasional (BN) candidate Datuk Seri Dr Wee Jeck Seng and Malaysian People's Movement Party (Gerakan) Wendy Subramaniam.
Also present were Berjasa President Dr Badrulhisham Abdul Aziz and two independent candidates, Dr Ang Chuan Lock who is also the head of a tuition center and Faridah Aryani Abdul Ghaffar.
They submit their nomination form before the one-hour nomination period ends at 10am.
Earlier, Zulkifly made the official announcement of a draft of the Tanjung Piai by-election to be included on the ballot paper.
"I call the candidates based on the arrival time and we will start the process now (draw order)," he said at 10.27am.
Follow the ballot number preceded by Wendy, Jeck Seng, Dr Ang.
In addition the fourth name is Carmine; Dr Badrulhisham and Faridah Aryani.


More news on the Tanjung Piai by-election


i.


From left, Dr Ang, Karmaine, Dr Badhrulhisham, Jeck Seng, Wendy Subramaniam and Faridah. PHOTO Hairul Anuar Rahim
